site.tagline: Where every stay feels like coming home.
site.description: Warmly hosted spaces for professionals, families, and those who deserve more than just a place to sleep — crafted with heart, held to the highest standards, and cared for like our own.
site.footerTagline: Where every stay feels like coming home.

hero.label: Boutique Hospitality
hero.title: A place that welcomes you.
hero.subtitle: Warm, beautifully designed spaces where the care of a thoughtful host meets the comfort you truly deserve — because every guest matters to us.

philosophy.label: Our Approach
philosophy.title: Where heartfelt hospitality meets
philosophy.text: We believe every guest deserves to feel genuinely cared for. That's why each property we host is chosen with heart and maintained with pride. We pour attention into the things that truly matter — immaculate spaces, dependable comforts, peaceful surroundings, and a host who's always there when you need them. This isn't about grand gestures. It's about the quiet, steady warmth of someone who truly wants your stay to feel effortless.

items.title: Designed with Love
items.description: Every room is arranged with warmth and intention — comfortable, inviting, and designed to feel like a place where you truly belong.

items.title: Spotlessly Maintained
items.description: Professional cleaning between every single stay. Fresh linens, gleaming surfaces, and a standard we hold close to our hearts — because you deserve nothing less.

items.title: Comfort That Embraces You
items.description: Premium bedding, carefully chosen amenities, and thoughtful touches in every corner — so your stay feels not just restful, but truly restorative.

items.title: A Host Who Truly Cares
items.description: Warm, responsive communication from a real person who takes genuine pride in making sure every moment of your stay feels right.

items.text: From the moment we walked in, everything felt right — clean, peaceful, and so thoughtfully prepared. It's rare to find a place that makes you feel this welcomed.
items.author: Sarah M.

items.text: You can feel the care in every detail. The linens, the kitchen, the quiet neighborhood — it all came together beautifully. We'll carry this stay with us.
items.author: James K.

items.text: This wasn't just a rental — it was someone's pride and joy, and it showed. The host made us feel like family. We're already planning our return.
items.author: Elena R.

designedForRealLife.label: Built for Real Life
designedForRealLife.title: Designed for
designedForRealLife.subtitle: Every detail chosen with you in mind — for guests who deserve a space that truly supports their days.

items.title: Reliable Wi-Fi
items.description: Fast, dependable connectivity so you can work, stream, and stay connected to the people who matter most.

items.title: Peaceful Surroundings
items.description: Nestled in quiet, residential neighborhoods — a calm retreat away from the noise, where you can truly breathe.

items.title: Work-Ready Spaces
items.description: Dedicated desks and comfortable setups designed for focused, productive days — because your work matters too.

items.title: Effortless Check-In
items.description: Arrive on your own time with clear, simple instructions — no waiting, no fuss, just a warm welcome waiting inside.

items.title: Professionally Cleaned
items.description: Thorough, consistent cleaning between every stay — because walking into a pristine space sets the tone for everything.

items.title: Safe & Secure
items.description: Your safety and peace of mind come first — thoughtful security measures so you can rest without a worry.

items.detail: Full kitchens, cozy living areas, and dedicated workspaces — a real home, not a room with a minibar and four walls.
Peaceful residential streets instead of crowded lobbies and elevator queues — the kind of quiet that lets you recharge.
Your own space, your own pace — with a caring host just a message away whenever you need anything at all.
Every space has its own soul and personality — thoughtfully designed interiors that tell a story and make you feel something.

cta.title: Ready to find your
cta.subtitle: Explore our collection of lovingly maintained properties and discover a space that feels made for you.

header.label: Our Story
header.subtitle: More than a place to stay — a heartfelt promise built on intention, warmth, and a genuine devotion to making every guest feel at home.

story.title: Why We Created
paragraphs: Exquisitebnb was born from something deeply personal: the belief that every traveler deserves to feel genuinely cared for. We've seen too many rentals that felt cold, careless, or forgettable — and we knew hospitality could be so much more than a clean room and a door code.

We've been those travelers ourselves — exhausted after long journeys, searching for somewhere that felt safe, warm, and welcoming. The rare stays that made us exhale and think, 'Someone really thought about me here' — those became our inspiration and our promise.

Every property we host carries a piece of that promise. We care about the softness of your linens, the warmth of the lighting, the reliability of every detail — because great hospitality isn't about impressing you. It's about making you feel like you matter. And you do.

philosophy.label: What We Believe
philosophy.title: The Heart Behind What We Do

values.title: Spaces with Soul
values.description: Every room is arranged with love and purpose — creating an atmosphere that feels calm, beautiful, and genuinely welcoming from the very first moment.

values.title: Standards We're Proud Of
values.description: Cleanliness and quality aren't extras — they're promises we keep. Every surface, every linen, every detail is held to a standard that reflects how much we care.

values.title: Hosting from the Heart
values.description: Behind every stay is a real person who listens, responds, and genuinely wants your experience to be something you'll remember with warmth.

values.title: You Come First, Always
values.description: From the amenities we choose to the way we welcome you — every decision is made with your comfort, your peace, and your happiness in mind.

closing.title: A Warm Stay,
closing.text: When you choose Exquisitebnb, you're choosing a host who pours their heart into every detail. Personal, reliable, and deeply committed to making your stay feel like home. We can't wait to welcome you.

header.label: Our Spaces
header.title: Places That Feel Like Home
header.subtitle: Each property is personally chosen and lovingly maintained — because we believe every guest deserves a space that feels like it was prepared just for them.

properties.bookingNote: All bookings are handled securely through trusted platforms

items.name: The Gilded Loft
items.description: A sun-filled downtown retreat where every corner has been thoughtfully designed for comfort and connection. Whether you're here to work, explore, or simply breathe — this space wraps around you like a warm welcome.
items.fullDescription: The Gilded Loft is more than a place to stay — it's a space that was designed with you in mind. Generous windows flood the rooms with natural light, while carefully chosen furnishings and a fully equipped kitchen make it effortless to settle into your own rhythm. Whether you're here for a weekend or a month, you'll feel the care woven into every detail.

reviews.text: Walking in felt like a breath of fresh air. Everything was spotless, peaceful, and so thoughtfully arranged. We didn't want to leave.
reviews.author: Sarah M.

reviews.text: The warmth of this place surprised us. The kitchen, the light, the little touches — it felt like someone truly cared about our stay.
reviews.author: James K.

items.name: Velvet Haven
items.description: A gentle, beautifully appointed sanctuary designed for rest and renewal. Soft textures, warm light, and a quiet setting that feels like a deep exhale after a long day.
items.fullDescription: Velvet Haven is a one-bedroom retreat crafted for those who need a moment of peace. Every texture, every light source, every detail has been chosen to help you slow down and truly rest. It's the kind of space that makes you feel held — quiet, immaculate, and close to everything you need, yet blissfully removed from the noise.

reviews.text: I've never felt so at peace in a rental. It was quiet, pristine, and designed with such tenderness. Exactly what my soul needed.
reviews.author: Elena R.

items.name: The Urban Retreat
items.description: A spacious, welcoming home with room for everyone to gather, laugh, and make memories. A full kitchen, comfortable living spaces, and a neighborhood so calm it feels like your own.
items.fullDescription: The Urban Retreat was designed for families and groups who need real space — and real warmth. Three bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and generous living areas give everyone room to be together or find their own quiet corner. Set in a peaceful residential neighborhood, this home is built for the kind of stays you'll talk about long after you've left.

reviews.text: Our family stayed for two weeks and it truly felt like our home away from home. The kids didn't want to leave, and honestly, neither did we.
reviews.author: Michael T.

items.name: The Serene Suite
items.description: A tranquil, spa-inspired haven near the water's edge. Designed for guests who crave stillness — with soft lighting, premium comforts, and an atmosphere that gently says, 'You can rest now.'
items.fullDescription: The Serene Suite is a waterfront sanctuary designed for those who need to truly unwind. Soothing tones, premium amenities, and carefully considered lighting create a space that welcomes you with calm from the very first step inside. Whether you're recovering from weeks of travel or settling in for a restorative stay, this is a place that gives you permission to breathe.

reviews.text: Immaculate, serene, and filled with quiet beauty. I felt genuinely taken care of — like the host had thought of everything before I even arrived.
reviews.author: Anna L.

header.label: We're Here to Help
header.title: Questions We're Happy to Answer
header.subtitle: We want you to feel confident and informed before, during, and after your stay. If something's not covered here, please don't hesitate to reach out — we're always glad to hear from you.

items.question: How do I book a stay?
items.answer: Simply browse our properties, find the one that speaks to you, and book through one of our trusted partner platforms — Airbnb, VRBO, or Booking.com. Each platform handles your reservation, payment, and guest protection, so you can book with complete peace of mind.

items.question: Which platforms do you use for bookings?
items.answer: We list our properties on Airbnb, VRBO, and Booking.com. Availability and pricing stay in sync across all three, so please use whichever platform feels most comfortable to you — we're happy either way.

items.question: How is cleanliness handled?
items.answer: Cleanliness is something we take deeply to heart. Every property is professionally cleaned between stays using thorough, hotel-level protocols. Fresh linens, sanitized surfaces, and restocked essentials are always waiting for you — because arriving to a pristine space is the very least you deserve.

items.question: What is the check-in and check-out process?
items.answer: We use self check-in with clear, friendly instructions sent before you arrive. Most properties feature smart locks or secure lockboxes, so you can arrive on your own schedule without any stress. Check-in is typically at 3 PM and check-out at 11 AM, though we're always happy to accommodate flexibility when we can.

items.question: What amenities are included?
items.answer: Every property comes with reliable high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens and towels, a fully equipped kitchen, fresh toiletries, coffee and tea, and streaming services. Many also include parking, air conditioning, a washer/dryer, and a dedicated workspace. You'll find the full details on each property page — we want you to feel fully prepared.

items.question: What is the cancellation policy?
items.answer: Cancellation terms are set by each booking platform and may vary by property. We always aim for fair, understanding terms — because life happens, and we get that. Full details are clearly visible before you confirm your booking.

items.question: How can I reach the host during my stay?
items.answer: You can message us anytime through the booking platform — we typically respond within 30 minutes during the day. For anything urgent, we provide a direct phone number after booking. Your comfort and peace of mind are our priority, and we're genuinely here for you.

items.question: Are pets allowed?
items.answer: We love pets! Policies do vary by property — some spaces warmly welcome furry companions with a small fee, while others remain pet-free for guests with sensitivities. Check the specific listing for details, or simply ask us — we're happy to help you find the right fit.

items.question: Is parking available?
items.answer: Many of our properties include complimentary parking — this is noted on each listing. For those without dedicated spots, we provide helpful information about nearby street parking and garage options so you're never left guessing.

items.question: Can I host events or gatherings?
items.answer: Our properties are designed as peaceful living spaces rather than event venues. Small, quiet gatherings may be possible with prior approval, but we kindly ask that parties be held elsewhere. This helps us keep every space beautiful and respectful for all our guests and neighbors.

contactCta.text: Still have a question on your mind?
contactCta.linkText: We'd love to hear from you →

header.label: Say Hello
header.title: We'd Love to Hear from You
header.subtitle: Whether it's a booking question, a special request, or simply something on your mind — please reach out. Every message means something to us.

contact.formNote: For booking inquiries, please complete your reservation through our partner platforms (Airbnb, VRBO, or Booking.com).
contact.successTitle: Your Message Means the World to Us
contact.successText: Thank you for reaching out — every inquiry is read personally and with care. We'll get back to you as soon as we can. In the meantime, feel free to explore our properties or browse our FAQs.

header.label: Reserve Your Stay
header.title: Book with Complete Confidence
header.subtitle: We partner with platforms you already trust to keep your booking secure, transparent, and stress-free. Choose the one that feels right for you.

whyTrusted.title: Why We Book Through Trusted Platforms
whyTrusted.subtitle: Your peace of mind is everything to us. Every booking is handled through established platforms that offer protection, support, and complete transparency.

features.title: You're Protected
features.description: Each platform provides comprehensive guest protection policies, so you can book knowing you're fully covered and cared for.

features.title: Payments You Can Trust
features.description: All payments are processed through encrypted, secure systems. Nothing is handled outside the platform — your security is non-negotiable.

features.title: Real-Time Availability
features.description: See up-to-date availability instantly and choose the dates that work for you — no waiting, no back and forth, just simplicity.

platforms.title: Choose Your Platform
platforms.subtitle: Our properties are listed on these trusted platforms — pick the one you're most comfortable with

items.name: Airbnb
items.description: Browse our listings, check availability, and book with the full protection and support that Airbnb provides.

items.name: VRBO
items.description: Explore our properties on VRBO with their Book with Confidence guarantee — because your trip deserves certainty.

items.name: Booking.com
items.description: View our spaces on Booking.com with flexible options and clear terms — making your planning effortless.

book.transparencyNote: Availability, pricing, and payments are managed by each booking platform. Once you complete your reservation, you'll receive confirmation through the platform — and a warm, personal note from us shortly after.

browseCta.title: Not sure which property is right for you?
browseCta.subtitle: Take your time — browse our spaces and find the one that feels like it was made for your stay.

hero.label: Partnership Opportunities
hero.title: Your Property, Our Shared Promise.
hero.subtitle: We don't manage properties by volume — we build meaningful, lasting partnerships with owners who share our belief that every guest deserves to feel genuinely welcomed.

whyPartner.label: A Different Approach
whyPartner.title: Why Partner With Exquisitebnb
whyPartner.text: Exquisitebnb was built on a deeply held belief: that memorable stays require heart and intention. Our partnerships are selective because the warmth we promise our guests begins with the values we share with our partners.

cards.title: Relationships Built on Trust
cards.description: We build partnerships rooted in mutual respect, shared values, and a genuine commitment to creating something meaningful together.

cards.title: Lasting, Sustainable Value
cards.description: Our focus is on long-term success — protecting your property's reputation while delivering guest experiences that people carry with them.

items.title: Heartfelt Positioning
items.description: Each property is presented as a unique space with its own story and character — never a generic listing, always a place with soul.

items.title: Design with Feeling
items.description: We offer warm, thoughtful guidance on styling, photography, and presentation to ensure your space truly shines.

items.title: Guests Who Appreciate
items.description: Our brand attracts travelers who value comfort, beauty, and care — guests who treat your space with the same love you put into it.

items.title: Operations You Can Count On
items.description: From guest communication to turnover — every detail is handled with consistency, professionalism, and genuine care.

items.title: Meaningful Brand Positioning
items.description: Your property becomes part of a carefully curated collection, attracting guests who seek warmth, beauty, and genuine hospitality.

items.title: Thoughtful Design Support
items.description: Receive heartfelt guidance on styling, amenities, and presentation that elevates the guest experience — and makes your property shine.

items.title: Seamless, Caring Operations
items.description: From communication to cleaning coordination — we handle every operational detail with professionalism and a personal touch.

items.title: Guests Who Truly Care
items.description: Our brand draws people who appreciate quality and treat your home with the same respect and love you've poured into it.

idealPartners.label: Ideal Partners
idealPartners.title: Who This Partnership Is For
items: Property owners with well-loved homes who want their space to be presented with the care it deserves
Investors who understand that genuine brand value protects and elevates property value
Design-conscious owners who believe the guest experience is worth getting right
Hospitality-minded professionals who value consistency, warmth, and reliability

noteFull.label: A Gentle Note
noteFull.title: This May Not Be the Right Fit If...
noteFull.text1: Our approach is intentional and deeply personal, which means it's not for everyone. If maximizing nightly rates matters more than guest experience, or if hospitality feels like a transaction rather than a calling, we may not be the right match.
noteFull.text2: We work best with partners who see their property as more than an asset — who see it as a space that deserves to be shared with care and pride.

process.label: How It Works
process.title: A Simple, Honest Process
process.subtitle: Great partnerships begin with genuine conversation — not paperwork.

steps.title: A Warm Conversation
steps.description: We start by getting to know you — your property, your hopes, and what a truly wonderful guest experience means to you.

steps.title: Finding Alignment
steps.description: If we're a good fit, we work together on positioning, presentation, and every detail — making sure everything feels right before we begin.

steps.title: Growing Together
steps.description: Your property joins our collection, and we stay in close, caring contact to ensure the standard we share continues to shine.

cta.title: Let's See If We're Meant to Work Together
cta.subtitle: No commitment needed — just a heartfelt conversation to explore whether partnering makes sense. We'd truly love to hear about your property and your vision.
cta.note: We personally respond to every inquiry within 48 hours.
